welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yangmei, Taiwan! Get ready to experience the charm of this beautiful city, known for its delicious fruit and friendly locals. We hope you enjoy your stay and explore all that Yangmei has to offer."

airports.airport_name: Taiwan Taoyuan International (Chiang Kai Shek International)

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original terminal of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newer terminal of Taiwan Taoyuan International Airport, mainly serving international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Taipei Songshan Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights only.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network after completing a short registration process.
